name: Furious Birds Remastered
description:
Remastered and Reimagined

 Experience the Thrill of the Birds Like Never Before with Furious Birds Remastered; Enhanced Graphics, Improved Gameplay, and New Content Await You!

How to play:

Drag the bird with your mouse to shoot, click to activate ability and go to the next bird.

There might be some small bugs. There is no level failed screen so you need to click restart yourself. If you don't click on "Next" when completing a level the next level won't be unlocked.

 

Doesn't do anything special.

Explodes  Can overpower the power of gravity
